data.name: Incarnation
data.detailed_description:
Incarnation is a third-person action role playing game, uncovering the mystery of Adriel through his journey in the soul scape. Darkness has taken over the world in the form of miasma and it's up to you to stop it. Set in a fictional world inspired by Native American cultures, you will journey through multiple different zones/biomes and experience new enemies, fight your way through dungeons, solving puzzles, and uncovering locked memories about who you are and what you are capable of.

Player's will experience agency in the form of equipment, stat manipulation through attribute points and bonus weights on weapons/armor, level progression, affinity system progression, and more. To claim victory, you must be prepared to face the mightiest foes and fight strategically in this free movement combat system.

All of these and so much more are what truly bring the story of Adriel to life, and they need your help in uncovering it. We hope you join us on this adventure through Incarnation and what the future holds.

data.short_description: A story driven action RPG, solving the mystery of who you truly are.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1500x and up
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
